WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Antimagic Field
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: This spell attracts or repels creatures of your choice.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Clone
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: This spell grows an inert duplicate of a living creature as a safeguard against death.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Control Weather
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You take control of the weather within a 5-mile radius for the duration.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Demiplane
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You create a shadowy door on a flat solid surface that you can see within range.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Dominate Monster
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Feeblemind
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Incendiary Cloud
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Maze
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Mind Blank
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is immune to psychic damage, any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Power Word Stun
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded.

WizardLevel8Spells.Name: Sunburst
WizardLevel8Spells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.
